languages.text: "Они подумали, что Неумирающий проклял их, лишив милосердия. Что убийцам и нарушителям теперь все дозволено. Глупцы. Есть множество способов служить Ему, не отсекая при этом душу от тела".

"They believed the Undying One had cursed them and revoked His mercy. They thought murderers and other wrongdoers now had free reign. Fools. There are many ways to serve Him without severing souls from bodies."
languages.original_text: "Они подумали, что Неумирающий проклял их, лишив милосердия. Что убийцам и нарушителям теперь все дозволено. Глупцы. Есть множество способов служить Ему, не отсекая при этом душу от тела".

traits.locale_text: "They thought the Undying One had cursed them and taken His mercy away. They thought murderers and other wrongdoers had free reign now. Fools. There are many ways to serve Him without severing a soul from a body."

"They thought the Undying One had cursed them and taken His mercy away. They thought murderers and other wrongdoers had free reign now. Fools. There are many ways to serve Him without severing a soul from a body."

"They believed the Undying One had cursed them and revoked His mercy. They thought murderers and other wrongdoers now had free reign. Fools. There are many ways to serve Him without severing souls from bodies."

"They believed the Undying One had cursed them and revoked His mercy. They thought murderers and other wrongdoers now had free reign. Fools. There are many ways to serve Him without severing souls from bodies."

"They believed the Undying One had cursed them and revoked His mercy. They thought murderers and other wrongdoers now had free reign. Fools. There are many ways to serve Him without severing souls from bodies."

"They believed the Undying One had cursed them and revoked His mercy. They thought murderers and other wrongdoers now had free reign. Fools. There are many ways to serve Him without severing souls from bodies."

languages.text: «Creían que el Inmortal los había maldecido al retirar Su piedad. Pensaban que los asesinos y otros criminales eran libres de hacer lo que quisieran. Necios. Hay muchas formas de servirle sin separar almas de sus cuerpos».
languages.original_text: "They believed the Undying One had cursed them and revoked His mercy. They thought murderers and other wrongdoers now had free reign. Fools. There are many ways to serve Him without severing souls from bodies."

traits.locale_text: «Creían que el Inmortal los había maldecido al retirar Su piedad. Pensaban que los asesinos y otros criminales eran libres de hacer lo que quisieran. Necios. Hay muchas formas de servirle sin separar almas de sus cuerpos».

languages.text: 「彼らは不死の者が自分たちを呪い、その慈悲を取り消したと信じていた。彼らは殺人者や他の悪人どもに自由が与えられたと思っていた。愚か者どもめ。魂と肉体を切り離さずとも主に仕える方法はいくらでもある」
languages.original_text: "They believed the Undying One had cursed them and revoked His mercy. They thought murderers and other wrongdoers now had free reign. Fools. There are many ways to serve Him without severing souls from bodies."

traits.locale_text: 「彼らは不死の者が自分たちを呪い、その慈悲を取り消したと信じていた。彼らは殺人者や他の悪人どもに自由が与えられたと思っていた。愚か者どもめ。魂と肉体を切り離さずとも主に仕える方法はいくらでもある」

languages.text: “他们以为不死之神收起了祂的仁慈，转而诅咒了他们。他们以为杀人犯与其他犯罪分子将会成为这里的主宰。何等愚蠢，哪怕无法将灵魂剥离肉体，我们也同样有很多其他方式可以侍奉不死之神。”
languages.original_text: "They believed the Undying One had cursed them and revoked His mercy. They thought murderers and other wrongdoers now had free reign. Fools. There are many ways to serve Him without severing souls from bodies."

traits.locale_text: “他们以为不死之神收起了祂的仁慈，转而诅咒了他们。他们以为杀人犯与其他犯罪分子将会成为这里的主宰。何等愚蠢，哪怕无法将灵魂剥离肉体，我们也同样有很多其他方式可以侍奉不死之神。”

languages.text: "Sie glaubten, der Todlose hätte sie verflucht und ihnen Seine Gnade entzogen. Sie dachten, Mörder und andere Übeltäter hätten nun freie Hand. Wie dumm! Es gibt viele Wege, Ihm zu deinen, ohne Seelen von Körpern zu trennen."
languages.original_text: "They believed the Undying One had cursed them and revoked His mercy. They thought murderers and other wrongdoers now had free reign. Fools. There are many ways to serve Him without severing souls from bodies."

traits.locale_text: "Sie glaubten, der Todlose hätte sie verflucht und ihnen Seine Gnade entzogen. Sie dachten, Mörder und andere Übeltäter hätten nun freie Hand. Wie dumm! Es gibt viele Wege, Ihm zu deinen, ohne Seelen von Körpern zu trennen."

languages.text: « Ils ont cru que l'Immortel les avait maudits et leur avait retiré sa miséricorde. Ils ont cru que les assassins et autres malfaiteurs régnaient désormais en maîtres. Quels imbéciles. Séparer des âmes de leur corps n'est pas le seul moyen de le servir. »
languages.original_text: "They believed the Undying One had cursed them and revoked His mercy. They thought murderers and other wrongdoers now had free reign. Fools. There are many ways to serve Him without severing souls from bodies."

traits.locale_text: « Ils ont cru que l'Immortel les avait maudits et leur avait retiré sa miséricorde. Ils ont cru que les assassins et autres malfaiteurs régnaient désormais en maîtres. Quels imbéciles. Séparer des âmes de leur corps n'est pas le seul moyen de le servir. »

languages.text: "Ölmeyen'in kendilerini lanetleyerek İmparator'un merhametini hükümsüz kıldığına inanıyorlar. Katillerin ve daha nice suçluların artık özgürce saltanat sürdüklerini düşünüyorlar. Ruhları bedenlerden koparmadan O'na hizmet etmenin pek çok yolu var."
languages.original_text: "They believed the Undying One had cursed them and revoked His mercy. They thought murderers and other wrongdoers now had free reign. Fools. There are many ways to serve Him without severing souls from bodies."
